name: Leafus
description:
A relaxing puzzle game inspired by Conway's Game of Life. Plant seeds and nurture their growth under each puzzle's conditions. Use the Undo feature to rewind your mistakes. We've also added fossils that halt growth, three different colors of plant cells, secret interactions, and more!

Made in 9 hours for the Ludum Dare 52 game jam. https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/leafus

Art by Animatrix1490: https://www.artstation.com/animatrix1490 https://animatrix1490.itch.io/

Code & Music by Koboldskeep: https://koboldskeep.itch.io

Source Code: https://github.com/tkeene/conways-crabapples
